类的使用
vrptw.algorithm.subproblem.AbstractPriceProblem

  • 使用AbstractPriceProblem的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    vrptw.algorithm.branchandprice
    Branch and Price Algorithm for VRPTW：
    C101-C109，R101的测试已经通过，但理论来说还有问题需要修复（例如分支子节点的 LP问题无初始可行解无法开始 CG), 这里主要展示的是 Branch and Price Algorithm 的框架，不再进一步处理这些问题了.
    vrptw.algorithm.subproblem.labelalgorithm  
    vrptw.algorithm.subproblem.pulsealgorithm  

    • vrptw.algorithm.branchandprice中AbstractPriceProblem的使用

      声明为AbstractPriceProblem的vrptw.algorithm.branchandprice中的字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      private AbstractPriceProblem BranchAndPrice.priceProblem
      Price Problem.
      参数类型为AbstractPriceProblem的vrptw.algorithm.branchandprice中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      (专用程序包) void BapNode.columnGeneration(BapMasterProblem masterProblem, AbstractPriceProblem priceProblem)
      Use column generation algorithm to solve the RMLP for the node.

    • vrptw.algorithm.subproblem.labelalgorithm中AbstractPriceProblem的使用

      vrptw.algorithm.subproblem.labelalgorithm中AbstractPriceProblem的子类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  EspptwccViaLabelCorrecting
      Solve an ESPPTWCC via dynamic programming labeling approach,
      see "3.4 Description of the Algorithm"in Feillet et al. (2006):
      An Exact Algorithm for the Elementary Shortest Path Problem with Resource Constraints:
      Application to Some Vehicle Routing Problems.
      class  SpptwccViaLabelSetting
      Solve a SPPTWCC via dynamic programming labeling approach,
      see "Algorithm 2.1 The general label setting algorithm (GLSA)" in Boland et al. (2006):
      Accelerated label setting algorithms for the elementary resource constrained shortest path problem.

    • vrptw.algorithm.subproblem.pulsealgorithm中AbstractPriceProblem的使用

      vrptw.algorithm.subproblem.pulsealgorithm中AbstractPriceProblem的子类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  EspptwccViaPulse
      Solve a SPPTWCC via Pulse Algorithm,
      see Leonardo Lozano, et al. (2015):
      An Exact Algorithm for the Elementary Shortest Path Problem with Resource Constraints,
      The code is based on https://github.com/dengfaheng/CGVRPTW/tree/master/CGVRPTW_DFH
